title: Excellent Service
text: Excellent IT service provider. The team contacted me quickly and dealt with my issue promptly & professionally. I can highly recommend this company.
author: Karen Lynn

title: Totally reliable IT service
text: I signed up with IT solutions with some trepidation as I had previously been relying on an American-based company.
author: Dianne Russell

title: Best company ever
text: I have been looking for a good online PC support company for some time and found it paid for a one-hour remote session which cleaned.
author: Marvin McKinney
